resources.string:
The game consists of the top panel, the playing field and a button on the bottom.
 
Top panel:
To restart the game, click the Smile button. This can be done at any time, even in the middle of the current game. But remember, this will delete the current progress.\n

\nThe timer shows the elapsed time since the start of the game. This timer can also be used as a pause Button. If you click the timer after the game is started, the game will be paused. If you click it when the game is paused the game will resume again.\n
Basically the home button and back button works the same. If you want to go back to change difficulty, you can press any of them.\n

You can play the game in two modes: Mine or Flag. In Mine mode you can open cells. In flag mode you can flag cells. If you press a cell in Mine mode, the cell will be uncovered. And if the cell contain a bomb, you will lost the game. You will not able to open a cell which is already flaged. If you press a cell in Flag mode, the cell will be marked. Which means you detected a bomb under the cell. In Flag mode if you press a cell which is already flagged, the flag will be taken away.\n
